| howEdible = poisonous

'''''Clitocybe fragrans''''' is a [[poisonous mushroom]]. It has a "fragrant" (''fragrans'') odor of [[aniseed]] and can be confused with the [[aniseed toadstool]]. The [[pileus (mycology)|cap]] and [[stipe (mycology)|stem]] are white.
